verses.text: \w No|strong="H3808"\w* man \w with|strong="H3947"\w* crushed \w or|strong="H3808"\w* severed genitals \w may|strong="H3808"\w* enter \w the|strong="H3947"\w* assembly \w of|strong="H3671"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
